name: Drimpê Pajé - BAGUVIX
description: BAGUVIX is part of Universal Beat (pt. 3), a sound experiment that believes in music as one of the strongest ways to connect and pacify the world, due to its sensorial capacity and universal language. Personally, Universal Beat (pt. 3) opens the door to a new field of knowledge, as it is my first NFT drop. Hope you like it.
